subject_terms_3: Portrait photography Women Children Peranakan costumes
physical_appearance: The image shows a black-and-white photograph. It is rectangular and it features two ladies and an infant. Both of the ladies are looking towards the direction where the photograph was captured. The lady on the left is holding an infant, while the lady on the right is feeding it with a bottle. Both the ladies are dressed in their ethnic costumes.
sgcool_label_text:
This photograph shows two Indo Eurasian women in sarong kebaya posing for the camera while feeding a baby.

With continuous improvement of camera technology, it became possible to take photographs outside a studio in the first decades of the 20th century. Many middle-class families collected photographs in albums as a way of documenting family life, or documentasi keluarga.
title_text: Photograph of two Indo Eurasian ladies with a baby
subject_terms_1: double portraits women (female humans) infants Peranakan folk costume
subject_terms_2: Portrait photography Black-and-white photography Women Infants Ethnic costume Eurasians
